GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
net: ethernet: ti: am65-cpsw-nuss: Fix some refcount leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 78aca10a16f001c9f49f1cc4dadfee8d444bb173, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit b1f66a5bee07adaab218fb98800928185e5f0f18. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: ethernet: ti: am65-cpsw-nuss: Fix some refcount leaks
